Text: Search with Norrton and there was no viruses.

Serial _doesn't_ work. If it was a _true_ serial, it would work with downloaded version 6 0150.0034. Don't trust 'modded' versions of malware removal software, unless you did it yourself. Someone got a serial that works to share w/us, please?

I'm a bit doubtful... This file is 2.68Mb, but when I download the free version of Ad-Aware from it's official homepage, the installer's size is 127,4Mb.

Do not download this.
